message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase my product.  I think it would be incredibly valuable to you.  Given its value, I'm offering it at $20,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $15,000 for it. Could we possibly come to an agreement at this price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking for a bit more than that.  Could you do $18,000?  I'm confident you'll see a significant return on this investment.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm still interested in purchasing the product, but I can only afford to pay $16,000. Would that be possible?
